name: Adam's Ale (rickdev@jap)
description:
Under development 3D game about resources management. You have control of everything that enters your city. Or not?

Controls:

WASD -  Movement

C - Crouch

Left Ctrl (Hold)/Spacebar (Hold) + WASD - Tilt body

E - Interact

Shift - Run 

Left Ctrl + R - Reload day
